de.tub.util
Class DBUtil

java.lang.Object
  de.tub.util.DBUtil

public class DBUtil
extends Object

This class provides methods for initializing and closing a connection to a database.

Author:
Sebastian Oelke

Method Detail

open

public static void open()
Sets up a connection to the database with the default values defined in the properties file jdbc.properties.

This is a convenience method for calling open(driver, url, user, password) with the default values.

See Also:
open(String, String, String, String)

open

public static void open(String driver,
                        String url,
                        String user,
                        String password)
                 throws NullPointerException
Sets up a connection to the database with the given parameters. Checks for non-null values.

Parameters:
driver - the driver to use for the connection
url - the url to use for the connection
user - the user to use for the connection
password - the password to use for the connection
Throws:
NullPointerException - if at least on of the given arguments is null.

close

public static void close()
Closes the connection to the database.

graph

public static org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService graph()
Creates a Neo4j EmbeddedGraphDatabase if not already done and returns it. This is a convenience method for graph(storagePath) using the default storage path for the creation of a Neo4j graph database.

Returns:
an instance of EmbeddedGraphDatabase with the storage directory specified in the properties file 'db.properties' with the key 'neo4j.path'.
See Also:
graph(String)

graph

public static org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService graph(String storagePath)
Creates a Neo4j EmbeddedGraphDatabase if not already done and returns it.

Parameters:
storagePath - the path to store the graph database in
Returns:
an instance of EmbeddedGraphDatabase with the storage directory specified in storagePath.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if the given storagePath is null

closeGraph

public static void closeGraph()
Closes the Neo4j EmbeddedGraphDatabase if it was instantiated beforehand.

See Also:
GraphDatabaseService.shutdown()

cypherEngine

public static org.neo4j.cypher.javacompat.ExecutionEngine cypherEngine()
Creates a Neo4j Cypher ExecutionEngine to run Cypher queries on the graph database.

Returns:
an instance of ExecutionEngine.
See Also:
ExecutionEngine

getNeo4jPath

public static String getNeo4jPath()
Returns:
the the path to the Neo4j graph database.
